RTKDeviceStatusFlags
Types
ResetReason

Possible RTK reset reason values POWER_ON  - 0x00000000 - Reset due to Power-on HARDWARE_RESET  - 0x00010000 - Hardware reset SOFT_RESET  - 0x00020000 - Soft reset WATCHDOG_RESET  - 0x00030000 - Watchdog reset
